eidolonunchained.codex.page.shadow_commu: Reach into the darkness to speak with Nyxathel the Shadow Lord. Draw the signs of Wicked, Wicked, and Blood to establish contact with the shadow realm.
This chant grants dark powers and opens forbidden communication with the deity of shadows.
eidolonunchained.codex.page.divine_commu: A sacred chant that opens communication with the Light Deity, Lumina. Draw the signs of Sacred, Harmony, and Warding to call upon divine blessing.
Blesses the caster and allows direct conversation with the deity of light.
eidolonunchained.codex.page.natures_comm: Connect with the natural world and speak with Sylvana, the Nature Deity. Draw the signs of Harmony, Soul, and Sacred to commune with nature.
Enhances your connection to the natural world and allows communication with nature's guardian.
eidolonunchained.codex.page.divine_judgm: Channel the wrath of the divine to strike down evil. Draw the signs of Sacred, Flame, and Death to invoke divine judgment.
A powerful offensive chant that calls upon divine power to destroy the wicked.
Unleash the fury of the earth itself. Draw the signs of Harmony, Flame, and Death to invoke nature's devastating power.
A destructive chant that channels the earth's anger against those who would harm the natural world.
eidolonunchained.codex.page.forbidden_kn: Seek out secrets that should remain hidden. Draw the signs of Wicked, Mind, and Magic to access forbidden lore.
A dangerous chant that reveals hidden knowledge at a terrible price.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.text_exampl: This is a simple text example showing how to create codex entries.
Text entries are the simplest type of codex content. They display formatted text to the reader.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.recipe_exam: Learn how to display crafting recipes in your codex entries.
Recipe pages automatically display crafting grids and ingredients.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.entity_exam: This entry demonstrates how to display entities in the codex.
This example demonstrates how to show entity information.
eidolonunchained.research.entry.simple_e: A basic example of the research system
eidolonunchained.research.entry.nature_b: A sacred ceremony to commune with Verdania, the Nature Guardian
eidolonunchained.research.entry.divine_p: A holy ritual to gain Lumina's blessing and cleanse the soul
eidolonunchained.research.entry.shadow_e: A dangerous ritual to gain power from Nyxathel, the Shadow Lord
research.discovery.need_tools: You sense something significant about this %s, but you need Note-Taking Tools to investigate further.
research.discovery.title: Research Discovered!
research.discovery.check_inventory: Check your inventory for Research Notes!
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.shadow_comm: Commune with Nyxathel the Shadow Lord through dark rituals. This chant opens a direct communication channel with the deity of shadows.
Draw the signs of Wicked, Wicked, and Blood to establish contact with the shadow realm.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.divine_comm: Seek guidance from Lumina the Sacred Guardian. This blessed chant allows communication with the deity of light and protection.
Draw the signs of Sacred, Harmony, and Warding to call upon divine blessing.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.natures_com: Connect with Verdania, Guardian of Nature. This chant harmonizes your spirit with the natural world.
Draw the signs of Harmony, Soul, and Sacred to commune with nature's guardian.
